rows.label: tlk70000034_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Did you see it?! My sweet Sarah's
bashful smile?! It was as though
God himself smiled upon me...

rows.label: tlk70000034_05_msg0002
rows.name:
I have never received thanks
as rewarding as that smile.

rows.label: tlk70000034_05_msg0003
rows.name:
Just to think of her makes my heart
flutter like a bird first taking flight!
My head is filled with love songs.

rows.label: tlk70000034_05_msg0004
rows.name:
Who knew love could be so rapturous,
so effervescent? Oh, my Sarah paints
the whole world in bright new colors!
